sqlMap.select: SELECT emract.* FROM ( SELECT APPODAT ,CONCAT( CONCAT( SUBSTR(PATNAME,1,1), 'O'), SUBSTR(PATNAME,3) ) as PATNAME ,DIAGCDNM ,APPOTM ,APPOROOM ,APPOFLAG ,APPODOCT ,APPODIAGCD ,ROOM ,SUBSTR(APPOROOM,1,1) as ROOMNUM ,NVL(SUBSTR(APPOROOM,2,1), 0) as PRIORITY FROM VW_ACCEPT emract WHERE APPODAT = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') AND APPOROOM is not null ORDER BY ROOMNUM, PRIORITY ) emract
